definitions.definition: used when the subject of the verb is "we" or the speaker and one or more others, and the object is the same group of people:
examples: We went to get ourselves something to eat.
We ourselves realize that there are flaws in the plan.

definitions.definition: alone or without help from anyone else:
examples: We were all by ourselves in the restaurant.
The hotel was very quiet so we had the swimming pool all to ourselves .
